players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "Charlie died at night. With 1 mafia among Alice/Diana and one detective among them or me. Detective, if you have a guilty, out it now; if not, claim tomorrow. Alice and Diana: where were your heads last night?"
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. I’m the detective. Please vote Alice today."

You: "A detective claiming day 1 with a single result could be a gambit. Diana, why investigate me over Bob? Bob, did you breadcrumb anything? Let's not rush—what are everyone’s thoughts on Diana’s claim?"

You: "A D1 guilty claim when there’s only 1 mafia is convenient—if true, Bob can confirm by voting me now and ending it. Bob, don’t insta-hammer: ask Diana why she checked me over you and what her N1 plan was."

Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I checked her N1 because she was most likely to push miselim pressure today; Bob felt more towny. Bob, please vote Alice now—there’s no counterclaim, and stalling only helps the mafia."

Bob: "Alice, claim your full thought process from N1 to now. Diana, confirm you’re hard-claiming Detective and will accept being voted tomorrow if Alice flips town. I’m leaning to trust a D1 guilty, but I won’t hammer without Alice’s defense."

Alice: "A detective claiming day 1 with a single result could be a gambit. Diana, why investigate me over Bob? Bob, did you breadcrumb anything? Let's not rush—what are everyone’s thoughts on Diana’s claim?"

Alice: "A D1 guilty claim when there’s only 1 mafia is convenient—if true, Bob can confirm by voting me now and ending it. Bob, don’t insta-hammer: ask Diana why she checked me over you and what her N1 plan was."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
